title: Disguise Self
content:
ise Self can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, Gloom Stalker, Trickery Domain, Warlock (Mask of Many Faces invocation) Disguise Self can be cast by using the following Items: Mask of the Shapeshifter (Digital Deluxe Edition). Travel to Emerald Grove campsite and open the Traveler's Chest.

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, Gloom Stalker, Trickery Domain, Warlock (Mask of Many Faces invocation)
